title: Client Freeze in champ select
body:
Ok so this has happened on a regular basis. so far 3 times today in ranked games. My client will show someone selecting a champ the the counter will go to 0. the nothing. i can navigate the masteries and runes but it wont update to when i pick. then i obviously get kicked for a  nonpick and penilized for it. im tired of this happening. i have done the hextech repair tool, full uninstall in reinstall of game and yet nothing seems to fix this. wtf is goin on. i need help and i need help now BEFORE i get banned. like i said 3 time in one day is redik.


Correction i have now been banned for 30 min cuz of this. Someone please help with this. i dont know what to do

replies.body: Are you running any third party apps like play.tv?  They've been known to cause crashes like this so I suggest removing them.  If the issue persists, let me know what errors you're getting exactly, and what version of the client you're on.  Leaverbuster can't be removed without completing your required games, but I'm happy to assist with any tech issues.  Let me know!
